item.description:
Hey guys,
Thursday night in New Haven there is going to be a Wingman outing. Starting at Bar between 9 and 10. This is a good chance for new members to get to meet some of the senior guys and have a wingman readily available.
Sergey will be there, I will try to be but not confirmed.
Any thoughts or questions, please let us know.
Thanks
JC
item.name: New Haven - Thursday Night Outing
